13  package net.sf.oval.test.constraints;
14  
15  import java.text.DateFormat;
16  import java.util.Calendar;
17  import java.util.Date;
18  
19  import net.sf.oval.constraint.DateRangeCheck;
20  
21  /**
22   * @author Sebastian Thomschke
23   */
24  public class DateRangeTest extends AbstractContraintsTest
25  {
26  	public void testDateRange() throws InterruptedException
27  	{
28  		final DateRangeCheck check = new DateRangeCheck();
29  		super.testCheck(check);
30  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, null, null, null));
31  		check.setFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
32  
33  		check.setMin("2000-03-03 09:09:09");
34  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, "2000-03-03 09:09:08", null, null));
35  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "2000-03-03 09:09:09", null, null));
36  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "2000-03-03 09:09:10", null, null));
37  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "2900-03-03 09:09:09", null, null));
38  
39  		check.setMax("2080-08-08 10:10:10");
40  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "2080-08-08 10:10:09", null, null));
41  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "2080-08-08 10:10:10", null, null));
42  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, "2080-08-08 10:10:11", null, null));
43  
44  		final Calendar cal = Calendar.getInstance();
45  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, cal, null, null));
46  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, cal.getTime(), null, null));
47  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, DateFormat.getDateTimeInstance().format(cal.getTime()), null, null));
48  
49  		cal.add(Calendar.YEAR, -100);
50  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, cal, null, null));
51  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, cal.getTime(), null, null));
52  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, DateFormat.getDateTimeInstance().format(cal.getTime()), null, null));
53  
54  		cal.add(Calendar.YEAR, 200);
55  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, cal, null, null));
56  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, cal.getTime(), null, null));
57  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, DateFormat.getDateTimeInstance().format(cal.getTime()), null, null));
58  
59  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, "bla", null, null));
60  	}
61  
62  	public void testLiterals()
63  	{
64  		final DateRangeCheck check = new DateRangeCheck();
65  		check.setFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
66  
67  		check.setMin("now");
68  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, new Date(), null, null));
69  		check.setMin("today");
70  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, new Date(), null, null));
71  		check.setMin("tomorrow");
72  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, new Date(), null, null));
73  		check.setMin("yesterday");
74  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, new Date(), null, null));
75  		check.setMin("");
76  
77  		check.setMax("now");
78  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, new Date(System.currentTimeMillis() + 4000), null, null));
79  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, new Date(System.currentTimeMillis() - 4000), null, null));
80  		check.setMax("today");
81  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, new Date(), null, null));
82  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "2000-03-03 09:09:10", null, null));
83  		check.setMax("tomorrow");
84  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, new Date(), null, null));
85  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "2000-03-03 09:09:10", null, null));
86  		check.setMax("yesterday");
87  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, new Date(), null, null));
88  		check.setMax("");
89  	}
90  
91  	public void testTolerance()
92  	{
93  		final DateRangeCheck check = new DateRangeCheck();
94  		check.setMax("now");
95  		check.setTolerance(4000);
96  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, new Date(System.currentTimeMillis() + 2000), null, null));
97  		check.setTolerance(0);
98  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, new Date(System.currentTimeMillis() + 2000), null, null));
99  		check.setMax("");
100 
101 		check.setMax("now");
102 		check.setTolerance(4000);
103 		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, new Date(System.currentTimeMillis() + 2000), null, null));
104 		check.setTolerance(0);
105 		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, new Date(System.currentTimeMillis() + 2000), null, null));
106 		check.setMax("");
107 	}
108 }
